articles.title: Friendly Meeting Hosted by Chinese Foreign Ministry
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting Hosted by Chinese Foreign Ministry
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The Chinese Foreign Ministry hosted a friendly meeting with the staff members of the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Tuesday on the occasion of the New Year.
					 Present at the meeting on invitation were Ambassador Ji Jae Ryong and staff members of the embassy. Vice Minister Zhang Zhijun and officials of the ministry were on hand.
					
					 They spent pleasant time, playing amusement games and watching an art performance.
					
					 A reception followed.

articles.title: Jongilbong Prize Skating Contest of Youth and Children Held
articles.content:
Jongilbong Prize Skating Contest of Youth and Children Held
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The 37th National Skating Contest of Skating Meet of School Youth and Children for Jongilbong Prize took place here from January 24 to 27.
					 The contest, divided into the group of secondary schools and the group of primary schools, brought together hundreds of school youth and children selected from different parts of the country.
					
					 Boys and girls of Chonggye Secondary School in Rason City and those of Yongnam Primary School in Kilju County and Hungdok Primary School in Hamhung City placed first in team standing respectively.

articles.title: IP Telephone Exchange Service System Developed
articles.content:
IP Telephone Exchange Service System Developed
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The Information Center of Kim Il Sung University of the DPRK developed an IP telephone exchange service system. 
					 The system ensures computer-to-computer conversation, computer-to-telephone conversation and telephone-to-telephone conversation. It also ensures a rapid and accurate message in any place outside.
					
					  It has various options, including video phone call and telephone meeting. 
					
					 It makes it possible to use telephone, IP telephone and soft telephone.

articles.title: Progress in Bioengineering Field
articles.content:
Progress in Bioengineering Field
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Progress has been made in researches into cutting-edge technology by the Bioengineering Branch of the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK recently. It includes development of various kinds of DNA samples for examining gene mutation and efficient anti-tumor immunotherapy, blood type conversion technology, technology of growing new crop strains and the technology of breeding animals by gene transfer.
					Among them are high-yielding rice seed that ensures safe farming on tideland-turned paddy fields and vermin-resistant corn strain.
					
					Progress has also been reported in researches into the strains of nutritious and virus-resistant potatoes amid satisfactory supply of potato virus diagnostic reagent to the countryside. 
					
					The Branch has intensified research into the grafted short apple tree by tissue culture, ensuring the supply to the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm.
					
					It also laid a solid scientific and technological foundation for the promotion of people's health and prophylactic treatment. It revealed the cause of various contagious diseases, developed medicines for intractable diseases and manufactured grow-fast medicines by genetic engineering method.

articles.title: Nanoparticle Gradation Analyzer Developed
articles.content:
Nanoparticle Gradation Analyzer Developed
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) - The Physics Institute of the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK recently developed a nanoparticle gradation analyzer.
					 The institute solved a number of scientific and technological problems. It succeeded in clarifying the characteristics of the intensity of rays radiated from nanoparticle changing with the flow of time and developing nanoparticle gradation analyzing program in Korean style.
					
					On this basis, it made a device for measuring and analyzing gradation of nanoparticle sample dispersed in solution up to 5nm to 5Î¼m in a non-contact way.
					
					 The analyzer which consists of an optical system, signal process and computer analyzer has a function of real time observation.
					
					 This laid a foundation for reenergizing the research into nano technology and the development of nano products.

articles.title: S. Korea Urged to Stop Slandering DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korea Urged to Stop Slandering DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities should stop at once mud-slinging and provocative acts deepening misunderstanding and mistrust and inciting confrontation and hostility between the north and the south, urged Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a bylined article. 
					 The authorities and ultra-right conservative media of south Korea floated stories hurting the DPRK's proposal for dialogue and let loose a spate of provocative remarks against it. This has been a main cause of deteriorating north-south relations, the article said, adding:
					
					 One party's accusations and mud-slinging against the other party have seriously harmed the national reconciliation and unity and the north-south relations as they indicate animosity and mistrust.
					
					 It is not a proper approach towards dialogue to persistently react to the party reaching out with good faith with an ill will.
					
					 It is quite clear that it will be hard to properly hold dialogue and negotiations nor is it possible to frankly discuss issues related to the fate of the nation and its common interests, development and prosperity even if the north and the south sit at a negotiating table, as long as mud-slinging and provocative acts are allowed between them.
					
					 If south Korea stops unreasonable acts of hurting and slandering its fellow countrymen in response to the call of the DPRK, this will help create a favorable atmosphere for dialogue and negotiations.

articles.title: Dialogue between North and South of Korea Urged
articles.content:
Dialogue between North and South of Korea Urged
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Dialogue and negotiations between the north and the south of Korea are the only way for settling the issue of the Korean Peninsula, said a Russian organization.
					  The Karelia Branch of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK said in its statement on Jan. 21:
					
					 To ease the tension constantly prevailing in the peninsula and ensure peace and stability there is the desire of all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas. Herein lies a way for national prosperity.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should respond to the DPRK joint statement calling for discussion over the issues related to the important cause of the nation and do their utmost to this end.

articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial of DPRK Studied Abroad
articles.content:
Joint New Year Editorial of DPRK Studied Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Seminars and reading sessions on the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK were held in South Africa, Tanzania and Nigeria between Jan. 10 and 21.
					 Present at the events were personages of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa, the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups, the Tanzania-DPRK Friendship Association, the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the University of Abuja and other people.
					
					The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa in the seminar said that the strategy of the Workers' Party of Korea for the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation is the most scientific and realistic one.
					
					 Noting that Korea does what it is determined to do--this immutable truth was confirmed by the reality, he expressed belief that the Korean people would surely fulfill the huge task for this year.

articles.title: DPRK Anniversaries to Be Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK Anniversaries to Be Commemorated Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Preparatory committees were formed in Nigeria and Nepal on Jan. 20 and 21 to commemorate the Day of the Sun, the birthday of President Kim Il Sung, and February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 The committees elected Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party and former deputy president of the Senate of Nigeria, and Dambar Shrestha, minister of Land Reform and Management of Nepal, to be their chairmen.
					
					 They decided to hold colorful political and cultural events on those occasions.

articles.title: Bulletin Issued in Bangladesh to Mark Kim Jong Il's Birthday
articles.content:
Bulletin Issued in Bangladesh to Mark Kim Jong Il's Birthday
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea released a special issue of its bulletin on Jan. 21 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					In an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il Revered by People" the bulletin said that he has turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power, thus putting the dignity and honor of the Korean people on the highest stage.
					
					 He provided strong military capability, a sure guarantee for independent politics, the article said, adding:
					
					 The DPRK ensured a high degree of political stability and cemented the single-minded unity of society towards the close of the last century when it was in the most difficult condition.
					
					 This would have been unthinkable without Kim Jong Il's politics of love and trust in the people.
					
					 He is carrying into reality the desire of the people to lead an affluent and civilized life with nothing to envy in the world.
					
					 The Korean people regard it as their highest honor and greatest happiness to be under his leadership.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Internet
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Internet
 Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Jan. 22 posted General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building" on its Internet homepage.
					 The work, published on Oct. 10, Juche 81 (1992), refers to the historical lessons drawn from the building of ruling party under socialism. It also clarifies the fundamental principles for the building of the revolutionary party of Juche type and the idea on strengthening internationalist unity and solidarity of the revolutionary parties.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de nueva banda electronica
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de nueva banda electronica
  Pyongyang, 27 de enero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion de la banda electronica del Conjunto Artistico de la Comandancia de las Fuerzas Aereas.
					  En la ocasion se presentaron los conciertos de instrumentos musicales electronicos "Nuestro deseo" y "?Donde esta el querido General?", el trio femenino "Encanto y veneracion", el quinteto masculino "Seremos el escudo del cielo" y otras piezas.
					
					  A traves de la funcion, los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico las hazanas de guia del Dirigente, realizadas bajo la bandera del Songun para el fortalecimiento del partido y las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y para la construccion de una patria prospera, el gran orgullo nacional del pueblo coreano que goza de generacion en generacion la felicidad de tener a los mejores lideres, generales y comandantes supremos.
					
					  Terminada la funcion, el Dirigente respondio con su mano alzada a las aclamaciones entusiastas de los ejecutantes y espectadores y les felicito por el exitoso espectaculo.
					
					  Aprecio altamente el exito de la funcion mostrandose muy contento de que la banda haya ofrecido esa magnifica funcion en que palpitan la conviccion y la voluntad de Corea y el espiritu revolucionario de los militares.
					
					  Aunque esta banda fue organizada hace poco, ella ha logrado un avance vertiginoso usando el revolucionario modo de creacion, senalo y subrayo que esto es el fruto orgulloso del espiritu revolucionario de los militares guardado en el corazon de los creadores y artistas de la banda.
					
					  Presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la creacion artistica de la banda.
					
					  Disfrutaron tambien la funcion Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam y Choe Thae Bok, miembros del Buro Politico y secretarios del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Choe Ryong Hae, miembro suplente del BP y secretario del CC del PTC y miembro de la Comision Militar Central del PTC,  Kim Phyong Hae, miembro suplente del BP y secretario del CC del PTC, Mun Kyong Dok, miembro suplente del BP y secretario del CC del PTC y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Kim Won Hong y Ri Pyong Chol, miembros de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, jefes de departamento del CDN, y otros cuadros directivos del ejercito.

articles.title: Tiene lugar 37a competencia de patinaje sobre hielo
articles.content:
Tiene lugar 37a competencia de patinaje sobre hielo
  Pyongyang, 27 de enero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 24 al 27 en esta capital el Juego de patinaje sobre hielo de la 37a Competencia Deportiva Nacional de Jovenes y Ninos Escolares por la Copa Jongilbong.
					  En este evento, que se efectuo dividido en la categoria de secundarias y la de primarias, participaron centenares de jugadores seleccionados en distintas localidades.
					
					  Los muchachos y las muchachas de la escuela secundaria de Chonggye de la ciudad de Rason ocuparon primeros lugares en la clasificacion general en los respectivos sexos.
					
					Lo hicieron tambien los ninos de la escuela primaria de Yongnam del distrito de Kilju y las ninas de la primaria de Hungdok de la ciudad de Hamhung.

articles.title: Desarrollado sistema de servicios telefonicos IP
articles.content:
Desarrollado sistema de servicios telefonicos IP
Pyongyang, 27 de enero (ATCC) -- El Centro de Informatica de la Universidad Kim Il Sung de Corea desarrollo el sistema de servicios telefonicos IP que funciona en la red de ordenadores.
					Gracias al nuevo sistema, los ordenadores y los telefonos normales pueden sostener rapida y exactamente desde cualquier lugar las comunicaciones telefonicas entre si.
					
					Facilita el trabajo y la vida de los hombres porque tiene varias funciones como video-llamada, reunion telefonica, etc.
					
					Satisface las demandas de todos los clientes al permitir el uso del telefono normal, el IP y el soft.

articles.title: Desarrollado aparato analizador de nano-particulas
articles.content:
Desarrollado aparato analizador de nano-particulas
Pyongyang, 27 de enero (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el Instituto de Fisica de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias de Corea desarrollo el aparato analizador de la distribucion de nano-particulas.
					Para inventarlo, los investigadores del instituto resolvieron muchos problemas cientificos y tecnicos como aclarar los cambios, que se dan a las horas diferentes en la intensidad de luz emitida de las nano-particulas, y desarrollar al estilo coreano el programa correspondiente.
					
					A base de ello, invento un aparato que mide y analiza en escala de 5 nm - 5?la distribucion de las muestras dispersas en la solucion.
					
					A grandes rasgos, el aparato se compone del sistema optico, las piezas de procesamiento de senales y de analisis por computadora y cumple la observacion en tiempo real.
					
					Gracias al nuevo invento, se ha sentado la base para dinamizar el estudio de la nano-tecnologia y el desarrollo de nano-productos.
